header.title: BAFTA Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role

categories.category: Film awards for Best Supporting Actor

signal.bdy:
The following is a complete list of the winners and nominees for the British Academy of Film and Television Arts (BAFTA) Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role. Awarded annually, actors of all nationalities are eligible to receive the award.
Winner and nominees

Ian Holm
- The Bofors Gun - as Flynn
Anthony Hopkins
–
The Lion in Winter - as Richard
George Segal
–
No Way to Treat a Lady
- as Morris Brummel

Mercutio

-

Bullitt - as Chalmers
Jack Nicholson –
Easy Rider - as George Hanson

Goodbye, Columbus - as Ben Patimkin

–

- as Timothy Evans
